item.description:
It's spring now and a great time to warm up for summer summits. Walk through thickets of laurel, over rock ledges and numerous brooks, to a spectacular ravine on this short but diverse 4 mile hike. This is a beginner hike to start off the season. I'm sure we can start a tradition of ending somewhere for ice cream which is always my favorite after a hike

Car pooling is suggested since there is limited parking. Once you sign up for this hike I'll send directions and contact information.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet where the cars are parked at the trail head
item.name: Warm Up Those Hiking Legs!
